name: SOL'S ASSESSMENT & REMEDIAL CENTRE (SOL'S ARC)

address: Veera industrial area, off. Veera desai road, Andheri west

briefDescription: Solâ€™s ARC is a registered non-profit organization established in 2003, under the Charitable Trust Act of Mumbai, working towards transforming education. We conduct innovative education research to build inclusive learning content, ensuring every child can learn and that our innovation will reach the last mile. We achieve our vision of "Every Child can Learn" through our schools, therapies & partnerships. We have developed a unique learning framework that makes the national curriculum inclusive and accessible for children and adults with learning lags from preschool to higher education. We believe that this innovation will be one of the key factors in reversing the statistics significantly.

address: B/102, Mrugchhaya society, off yari Road
